participant_1.background:
I spill my Coke all the time when I'm talking.
i am a weightlifter.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
I'm keeping it professional at work and focused on my studies.

participant_2.background:
I am an advocate for healthy living, despite my size.
I wear comfortable, casual, and rock-inspired clothing.
I treasure the time I spend with my dog, George.
i love to watch game shows.
I spend my days reading, playing, and eating ice cream with my friends and partner.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a bit of a weightlifter. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play game shows, read, and eat ice cream with my friends and partner.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What is your favorite game show?
I like to watch Jeopardy, Wheel of Fortune, and Family Feud.
I've never seen Family Feud, but I've heard it's a lot of fun.
It is! You should check it out sometime.
I will! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mystery, thriller, and suspense novels.
I love those kinds of books too! What's your favorite mystery novel?
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but I really enjoyed the Girl on the Train.
I haven't read that one, but I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
I know what I'm reading next! What's your favorite ice cream flavor?
I like vanilla ice cream with chocolate sprinkles.
That's a classic! I love vanilla ice cream too.
I think we'd be good friends. We have a lot in common.
I think so too! Let's hang out sometime.
